title: Joint associations of leisure time physical activity and screen sitting time with long-term sickness absence due to mental and musculoskeletal diseases: a registry linked follow-up study
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 233

Author(s): K.H. Sarttila, M. Kuusela, V. Pohjola, A. Lundqvist, A.J. Hautala, A.J. Pesola, J. Lahti
